name: Ant-Man
origin: Scott Lang, a thief who acquires a suit that allows him to shrink in size and gain superhuman strength, originally created by Hank Pym.
powers: Ability to shrink to subatomic sizes and grow to giant proportions, superhuman strength at small size, and control over ants.
events: Stealing the Ant-Man suit to save his daughter, battling Yellowjacket, and joining the Avengers.
allies: Hope van Dyne (Wasp), Hank Pym, Luis.
